H0.text: A second referendum is due to be held for which commonwealth to decide whether, among other options, to become the 51st state of the USA. Bermuda

A4.text: The Puerto Rico Status Act was being worked on by Congress, and H.R. 8393 passed the House in 2022â€”though it has not passed the Senate; this bill would support PR making a binding referendum.

A5.text: In 2009, the United Nations Special Committee on Decolonization approved a draft resolution calling on the U.S. government to expedite a process that would allow the Puerto Rican people to exercise fully their inalienable right to self-determination and independence.
